position.marginalia_text: Sal minerale p[ri]mò nobis proponitur: vegetabile ex leone viridi oritur et Animale ex rubro leone elicitur: vna tame[n] materia est et corpus vnu[m]: a candore, salis obtineus nome[n], et a corrosiva sua natura. I. d.

marginalia.translation: Salt is our first mineral displayed: the vegetative is born from the green lion and the animal is pulled forth from the red lion: one is still a material and one a body: the name of salt is obtained by beauty, and its nature by corrosiveness.
